overview: Eliminate the North Korean hidden VIPs!  Won-cheol of the National Intelligence Service of the Republic of Korea is offered a mission.  Eliminating VIPs who participated in the operation to develop weapons of mass destruction in North Korea.  Won-cheol is forced to accept the mission while thinking of her daughter 'Ah-reum' who is in danger…  The secret operation of South and North Korean special agents begin!
title: Special Agent
